Statement: Alright then, I'm not lettin' this chance slide. I'm comin' with you whether you like it or not!
Or perhaps I'm getting a little ahead of myself. I'm sure there are better adventures for me in the future.
Oi lad! Do you need something from around here?
Option 2: I have a strange feeling you might know something about the Arc of Life.
Option 3: Where the heck even am I?

Statement: You're not from around here. Who are you?!
Well, ____,  welcome to Island Three. My name's Terry Wrist. Visitors certainly are a rare sight nowadays.
Option 1: How can there be islands within a city like this?
Option 2: I can imagine. Not much to see around here.

Statement: You've heard about the Great Flood, haven't you? Unless you've been living under a rock your entire life.
Option 1: Of course, I didn't make the connection.
Option 2: Thank you for your time, is there anything else you can tell me?
Option 3: Thank you, can I ask you something else?

Statement: Island Three! The greatest and biggest of all the islands around Seattle.
Option 1: Doesn't look so great to me. That building over there is falling to pieces as we speak.

Statement: After the flood, there really wasn't much need for professions anymore. We all just do what we gotta to survive nowadays.
Option 1: That seems tough. What's stopping you from leaving??

Statement: Well just about everything is. We can't take a boat too far out and we can't step onto the mainland unless we're prepared to die.
Option 2: Could I ask you another question?

Statement: You're right about that. Anyways it's not like anyone here's got that much of a reason to leave.
Option 1: Could I ask you another question?

Statement: And what exactly gave you that impression, kid?
Option 1: Just a gut feeling. Almost as if someone had told me about you.
Option 2: Does it matter? Just help me out here.
Option 3: Just a guess, you seem like a smart guy.

Statement: In any case, you wanna know about the Arc of Life? Not many people come here interested in that thing. It's really only a rumor but I personally believe it exists.
Option 2: Oh! Finally someone who agrees with me!
Option 3: Yeah It's real annoying when people simply write it off as some myth.

Statement: Well let's just say I'm sort of an adventurous type who never really found a reason to leave this place.
Option 1: I take it information isn't your strong suite then?
Option 2: Well I'm not gonna lie I am on a bit of an adventure myself.
Option 3: Hmmm... guess I had a different impresion.

Statement: Strength over knowledge I say! But my friend Judd Keagan could tell you a lot more about the Arc of Life than myself.
Option 1: I might have some trouble finding him though...
Option 2: Well if you're willing to help, we can talk more on our way there.
Option 3: Wow, guess you must get lonely sometimes in this city then.

Statement: You know what? I think I just found myeslf an opportunity...
